page.title: 14Bramhope: Housing 2
page.content: Characteristics of the estate housing situated to the west of Otley Road include brick construction,integral garages and gardens to front and rear. Though the majority of houses are the detached variety,the area does include semi-detached houses and bungalows. Another estate which nestles into the hillside overlooking the Wharfe Valley consists of stone-faced properties, frequently containing second bathrooms and 4 or more bedrooms.Semi-detached houses provided by the Local Authority can be found in two small locations,but approximately half of these are now privately owned.In addition to Bramhope's few purpose built flats,most apartment style homes result from the conversion of larger properties.The wide variety of building styles in this area enhance Bramhope's pleasant rural atmosphere.
